summary: WHILE DRIVING 70 MPH VEHICLE BEGAN TO WOBBLE AND PULLED HARD TO THE LEFT. THE CONSUMER TOOK THE CAR BACK TO THE DEALERSHIP TO BE FIXED BUT NO WORK WAS DONE. THE CONSUMER WROTE LETTERS MADE COMPLAINTS. EVEN SUGGESTED TO BE FULLY REFUNDED FOR THE VEHICLE. DEALERSHIP LACK OF CONCERN CAUSED THE CONSUMER TO GO TO ANOTHER SERVICE DEALER AND PAID $63.15 FOR REPAIRS.  *NLM   *CB
